Enum Class Roles

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Roles>
utils.permissions.Roles
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Roles>, Constable
public enum Roles extends Enum<Roles>
This enumeration defines various user roles within the system. Each role is represented by a unique bit value for permission handling via bitwise operations.
Author:
Dhruv
